name: iniin2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2))))

stmt.origin: eqcomd(cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), wne(c0, emptycls))

body.origin:
|- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2))))
-| wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2))))
-| wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cin(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2))))

comment: Indexed intersection of intersection. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
